Class MainControl.PopupMouseEventHandler

java.lang.Object
com.brestats.control.MainControl.PopupMouseEventHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, EventHandler<MouseEvent>
Enclosing class:
MainControl
private class MainControl.PopupMouseEventHandler extends Object implements EventHandler<MouseEvent>
A class represeting all the popup features, like selecting city label with cursor or arrow keys
